title: Pride's Run
description: My name is Pride. I'm a tracker. A werewolf with a hunger for blood. I've been taught to trick and to lure. I'm the perfect killing machine. I'm kept leashed in my master's cellar. He's a man who is as ruthless as he is powerful. I want freedom. I want to live a normal life, but escape from the compound is near impossible and disobedience comes with a price.When I learns my master intends to breed me with Stone, a boy/wolf I hate, I know I have to run.My next assignmet is to hunt down a rogue named Logan, and I use that opportunity to flee, but soon enough I realize the only way I can survive outside the compound is to trust the rogue. But I trust no one. In the wild I learn that Stone, the wolf I hated, is not who I thought he was. Neither is Logan. My survival depends on choosing between the two alphas and finding my true mate.I can't make a mistake.
author: Cat Kalen
